page.title: 13A day in my life
page.content: I can't go straight home from school because my mum and dad are still at work.Therefore I go to the house which I go to before school.My mum gets home from work around 4 o clock.When I see her pass I go home too.When I get home I usually go upstairs and play with my computer if I haven't got any homework.Before I know it my mum is calling me for tea.I go downstairs and have tea with my mum and brother as my dad does not get in until much later.After tea my brother and I go into the lounge and have a game of snooker whilst my mum talks to my dad in the kitchen.At 8 o clock I go upstairs and have a bath and clean my teeth.Then I get into bed and read for a while.I soon drop off to sleep and when I awake it is 6.50a.m. and I am ready to start again.
